page.title: 081st.AUDLEY GIRL GUIDES
page.content: In Audley Guides we have three patrols called Chaffinch,Swallow and White Heather.We meet every Monday night at 7.3Opm till 9.00pm in Audley Church Hal Our Guide leader is Mrs.Turner who organises games or quizzes or treasure hunts around the village.Our patrol leader is Samantha Lewis and at every meeting,she collects in our subs and any money for our patrol fund.She also gives us any information about trips and camps. This year the Guides are celebrating their 75th anniversary and we had a special day to remember it. The celebration started at 6.30pm.When we arrived at the camp we gave the money in for our hamburgers which were going to be cooked on a barbeque.When we all had our candles lit we sang a song called "Join Hands".We then blew our canles out and moved nearer the fire.
